Episode.GuestStars: |Allison Gobuzzi|Aria Shahghasemi|Bella Samman|Candice King|Matthew Davis|Nathan Parsons|
Episode.Overview: With Hope facing a life-threatening affliction and deteriorating quickly, Klaus travels to Mystic Falls to seek help from Caroline. Tasked with keeping Hope preoccupied in Mystic Falls, Elijah comes to a heartbreaking realization about his niece. Meanwhile, at the Salvatore School for the Young and Gifted, a run-in with Alaric Saltzman throws a wrench into Klaus’ plan.
